Articles.Content:
> 
> ![THuYm.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/THuYm.jpg)
> 
> Me being a horrible shot
> 
> ![vOktA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/vOktA.jpg)
> 
> Me being a horrible shot again. Good thing I missed, we can\'t afford to spackle any more of these holes!
> 
> 

Because nobody likes small fighters. It\'s rather maneuverable, but kinda slow. (200m/s at 5km) At least the engines in the back look nice all red hot.

Oh yeah, you need the JAWRD railguns and mk2 hull bicoupler.

And here\'s the download, almost forgot that: [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/48481896/AF7%20Sprite.craft](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/48481896/AF7%20Sprite.craft)
Where can I get that bicoupler? Search only turns up this thread.

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0)

That has both the railgun and the bicoupler
